languages.text: "Все будущие арбитры проходят через потерю родителей — это делает нас стойкими, приверженными лишь долгу. Тебя же кончина отца скорее еще больше сведет с ума".
languages.translation_comment:
Fought the image of the Undying One and killed the Vizsier.
Kibellah: "Mentor... our last duel was your final lesson. The wounds you left are your parting gift. I will treasure them, until the Undying Emperor summons me."

languages.text: "All prospective Arbitrators must first endure the loss of their parents — it tempers us, and duty becomes our sole pillar. You, however, will likely grow only more unstable after your father's death."
languages.translation_comment:
Fought the image of the Undying One and killed the Vizsier.
Kibellah: "Mentor... our last duel was your final lesson. The wounds you left are your parting gift. I will treasure them, until the Undying Emperor summons me."
languages.original_text: "Все будущие арбитры проходят через потерю родителей — это делает нас стойкими, приверженными лишь долгу. Тебя же кончина отца скорее еще больше сведет с ума".

traits.locale_text: "All future Arbitrators go through the loss of their parents — it tempers us, and duty becomes our sole pillar. You, however, are more likely to grow even more unstable after your father's death."
"All future Arbitrators go through the loss of their parents — it tempers us, and duty becomes our sole pillar. You, however, are more likely to grow even more unstable after your father's death."

"All prospective Arbitrators must endure the loss of their parents sooner or later — it tempers us, and duty becomes our sole pillar. You, however, will likely grow only more unstable after your father's death."

"All prospective Arbitrators must endure the loss of their parents sooner or later — it tempers us, and duty becomes our sole pillar. You, however, will likely grow only more unstable after your father's death."

"All prospective Arbitrators must first endure the loss of their parents — it tempers us, and duty becomes our sole pillar. You, however, will likely grow only more unstable after your father's death."

"All prospective Arbitrators must first endure the loss of their parents — it tempers us, and duty becomes our sole pillar. You, however, will likely grow only more unstable after your father's death."

languages.text: 「すべての見習いアービトレイターはまず両親の喪失を経験しなければならない。それが俺たちを鍛え、義務が唯一の支えとなるのだ。だが、お前は父親の死後、ますます不安定になるだろうな」
languages.original_text: "All prospective Arbitrators must first endure the loss of their parents — it tempers us, and duty becomes our sole pillar. You, however, will likely grow only more unstable after your father's death."

traits.locale_text: 「すべての見習いアービトレイターはまず両親の喪失を経験しなければならない。それが俺たちを鍛え、義務が唯一の支えとなるのだ。だが、お前は父親の死後、ますます不安定になるだろうな」

languages.text: "Alle künftigen Arbitratoren müssen zunächst den Verlust ihrer Eltern verkraften – das macht uns hart, und die Pflicht wird zu unserer einzigen Säule. Ihr jedoch werdet nach dem Tod Eures Vaters wahrscheinlich noch labiler."
languages.original_text: "All prospective Arbitrators must first endure the loss of their parents — it tempers us, and duty becomes our sole pillar. You, however, will likely grow only more unstable after your father's death."

traits.locale_text: "Alle künftigen Arbitratoren müssen zunächst den Verlust ihrer Eltern verkraften – das macht uns hart, und die Pflicht wird zu unserer einzigen Säule. Ihr jedoch werdet nach dem Tod Eures Vaters wahrscheinlich noch labiler."

languages.text: «Todo futuro Arbitrator debe superar primero la pérdida de sus padres. Nos templa y hace que el deber sea nuestro único sustento. Usted, mientras, probablemente solo se vuelva más inestable tras la muerte de su padre».
languages.original_text: "All prospective Arbitrators must first endure the loss of their parents — it tempers us, and duty becomes our sole pillar. You, however, will likely grow only more unstable after your father's death."

traits.locale_text: «Todo futuro Arbitrator debe superar primero la pérdida de sus padres. Nos templa y hace que el deber sea nuestro único sustento. Usted, mientras, probablemente solo se vuelva más inestable tras la muerte de su padre».

languages.text: “所有法务官都必须忍受失去父母的痛苦，这会让我们的意志更加坚定，让我们矢志不渝地履行职责。至于你，你失去了你的父亲，恐怕行事会变得更加乖张。”
languages.original_text: "All prospective Arbitrators must first endure the loss of their parents — it tempers us, and duty becomes our sole pillar. You, however, will likely grow only more unstable after your father's death."

traits.locale_text: “所有法务官都必须忍受失去父母的痛苦，这会让我们的意志更加坚定，让我们矢志不渝地履行职责。至于你，你失去了你的父亲，恐怕行事会变得更加乖张。”

languages.text: "Yargıcı olmak isteyenlerin önce anne babalarını kaybetmiş olması gerekir. Bu kayıp bizi olgunlaştırır ve vazifemiz, tek dayanağımız olur. Ancak sen... Babanın ölümünden sonra büyük ihtimalle daha da dengesizleşeceksin."
languages.original_text: "All prospective Arbitrators must first endure the loss of their parents — it tempers us, and duty becomes our sole pillar. You, however, will likely grow only more unstable after your father's death."

traits.locale_text: "Yargıcı olmak isteyenlerin önce anne babalarını kaybetmiş olması gerekir. Bu kayıp bizi olgunlaştırır ve vazifemiz, tek dayanağımız olur. Ancak sen... Babanın ölümünden sonra büyük ihtimalle daha da dengesizleşeceksin."

languages.original_text: "All prospective Arbitrators must first endure the loss of their parents — it tempers us, and duty becomes our sole pillar. You, however, will likely grow only more unstable after your father's death."

languages.text: « Tous les aspirants arbitrators doivent d'abord subir la perte de leurs parents. Cela nous endurcit et le devoir devient notre seule raison d'être. Vous, en revanche, ne ferez probablement que devenir plus instable après la mort de votre père. »
languages.original_text: "All prospective Arbitrators must first endure the loss of their parents — it tempers us, and duty becomes our sole pillar. You, however, will likely grow only more unstable after your father's death."

traits.locale_text: « Tous les aspirants arbitrators doivent d'abord subir la perte de leurs parents. Cela nous endurcit et le devoir devient notre seule raison d'être. Vous, en revanche, ne ferez probablement que devenir plus instable après la mort de votre père. »
